extendedInfo.description: Hi SMS is an iPhone Style and Android Capability SMS app. Very cool UI  and easy to use. You can get the exciting iPhone Style and Android Capability SMS in Android Phone!Major Feature:- Support iPhone Style and message feature- Support message conversation- Support search in messages- Support MMS with picture,camera,video,audo,slideshow- Support forward,delete,copy messages- Support set SMS/MMS conversation limit- Support SMS/MMS deliver report- Support manage SIM card messages- Support more than 800 Emoji which is able to display in iPhone SMS and Go SMS- Support status bar on/off for incoming message- Support select ringtone for incoming message- Support vibrate setting for incoming message - Support Fonts resize- Support transfer the apk to SD card- Support Delete all threads- Support popup window, directly reply and delete in popup window- Support android 2.2 devices- Support Samsung Galaxy S4 and HTC One- Support 1080P resolution- Support iOS7 theme- Support forward in popup window- Support Hi Dev Studio Bundles License Key Gesture:- Support the gesture(slip from right to left) to delete the message in message listIf you like this app, pls rated 5 stars to encourage us and also help to recommend to your friends and family.If you have any issue or suggestion, please send an e-mail to hidevstudio(at)gmail.com. Just rate one star can't help to resolve any issues. Sending mail to us will definitely get feedback.Or follow usFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/HiDevStudioTwitter:https://twitter.com/hidevstudioLet's go to enjoy it!Tag: iPhone Style, SMS, MMS, Emoji,iOS7, iOS 7,iPhone 5, iPhone 4SThe app is ad-supported. You can get more iPhone Style and Android capability Apps in "Hi Dev Studio".Thanks!

reviews.title: No Lanscape mode ??
reviews.comment: I thought Hi SMS had Landscape mode ... I love all your apps, but if you want to win over iPhone people then you need the Landscape mode. I have a Samsung Galaxy Note. I use this for work and personal. Because my Phone (and the other BIG phones out there) it is a must ! Please fix this .... I\'m buying all you Hi Apps. If you can\'t support Landscape then I will uninstall all of them and make sure this is noted in Facebook and Twitter. Thanks for listening.
reviews.author: John Kovac

reviews.title: Spark tv
reviews.comment: Why is it everytime i got new messages old one? I mean it must turn off other mssgs. Only hi sms must appear in the status bar and notification bar. Pls fix coz i like this app esp the iphone style.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It is now fine, and I am using the latest version thanks for the help!

reviews.title: the font !!!!
reviews.comment: why is the font always choco cockie ??? i changed the font of my phone so it cant be choco cockie .. but still it is !! .. when i go to the settings the default is also choco cockie .. pls fix i really like this app .. ps. I HATE THE ADS !
reviews.author: Starlit Ollis

reviews.title: Ok but...
reviews.comment: This is a nice app for the iPhone look. There\'s a few things like having contact pictures beside the message that would be nice to see, along with being able to change to custom fonts and bubble colours? Future plans maybe? Good starting point though, still going to carry on using this and hopefully updates will only make it better.
reviews.author: Amber Toothill

reviews.title: Awesome app, love the emojis
reviews.comment: This is a really good app that lets you view,sell,and receive emojis. The only problem is with the crashing and freezing.
